ref: 7573b †*nīharati, nírharati ʻ drives out ʼ RV. [niẓ -- h -- > nī -- h- Turner ColPa 42: √hr̥]
Pa. nīharati ʻ drives out, expels ʼ,
WPah.kṭg. nn/arnõ ʻ to stop, warn, dissuade ʼ on ac. of intonation, rather than < nivārayati Him.I 164 or *nīrīyatē;

lang: or mald. Maldivian dialect of Sinhalese
ref: Md. nerenī ʻ extracts ʼ, neruvanī ʻ drives out ʼ (or < *nīrīyatē or *nirvarayati).
